subject: Automobile Racing
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Methamphetamines
Tests and Testing
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The suspension of Jeremy Mayfield, a 17-year veteran driver, for a positive drug test has led to a protracted legal drama highlighting the problems with Nascar’s testing policies.
snippet: The suspension of Jeremy Mayfield, a 17-year veteran driver, for a positive drug test has led to a protracted legal drama highlighting the problems with Nascar’s testing policies.
